name: Hiran Gunawardana
bio: With over 15 years of coaching excellence in Sri Lanka and the UAE, Hiran has built a reputation for transforming teams and producing top-performing players. Renowned for his technical mastery and player development skills, he continues to inspire cricketers to reach their highest potential.
experience: Head Coach - Old Anthony’s Cricket Club, Sri Lanka (2022, Div 1)
Head Coach Junior Cricket - Dharmapala College, Sri Lanka (2018–2019)
Head Coach - St. Johns College, Sri Lanka (2015–2017)
achievements: Nalanda College 1999–2000 Best Batsman / Colours Man
1000+ runs in two Sri Lankan Div 1 College Cricket seasons consecutively (1997–1998)

name: Himasha Kumarage
experience: 3 years of experience with Freedem Cricket Academy UAE
achievements: Represented the UAE National Development Squad

name: Prajeev Jansze
experience: 14+ years of coaching across Sri Lanka, New Zealand, Qatar, and UAE
Has coached players at academy, school, and competitive levels
achievements: New Zealand: Hazlett Trophy Champions (2012) – Wellington

name: W.A. Gihan Lakshitha De Silva
experience: 6 months coaching at Anula Vidyalaya, Nugegoda
6 months coaching at Lumbini College, Colombo 05
